short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thomas More Research Tool | Concept & Content: Alex Wuyts | Coding & Design: Fatjon Zariqi & Hamza Raja & Brent Rutten

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Alpha-Omega Research Tool provides access to a wealth of research web resources. 
It has been developed for use by students and staff of Thomas More University of Applied Sciences and KU Leuven in Belgium but can easily be adapted for other organizations.
